title: "Machine learning reveals how to dissolve polymeric materials in organic solvents"
excerpt: "Dissolving polymers with organic solvents is the essential process in the research and development of polymeric materials, including polymer synthesis, refining, painting, and coating. Now more than ever recycling plastic waste is a particularly imperative part of reducing carbon produced by the materials development processes."
